work.name: Banprocesos Outsourcing Services
work.summary: I did my professional practice in this company. Programming a work agenda in the intranet for the employees of the company, facilitating the organization and understanding of the work they have to do every day.
highlights: Developed Equipment Inventory Management System (ASP.NET, C#, SQL Server)
Developed SQL scripts to Insert, Update, Delete and Merge data in the database tables along with SQL joins and cursors.

volunteer.summary: I provide assistance to clients that I have done over time, frequently perform maintenance on their equipment and computer systems and repair any faults in the equipment.

projects.name: Automated Teller Machine
projects.description: This is a project that consisted of creating a simulation of an ATM that reads an amount indicated by the user, and the ATM delivered the minimum amount of bills.

projects.name: Supreme Store
projects.description: This project consists of a virtual store about a clothing brand. Where it contains sections for both the company's information and to show their products in a creative way.

projects.name: Bank Project
projects.description: This project consists of an application for a bank, where you can take a better organization of customers, users, the movements that customers have in terms of their money, and various reports that can make a person to see the information you want.

projects.name: Control of Credit Sales in a Supermarket
projects.description: This project consists of an application for the control of credit sales in a supermarket. With the purpose of carrying a better organization of customer information, users, the movements that a person has with his money in the supermarket, the details of the purchases made and various reports that a person can make to see the information you want.
projects.entity: Control of Credit Sales in a Supermarket

projects.name: Sales Control of a Pharmacy
projects.description: This project consists of an application for the control of a pharmacy. With the purpose of carrying out a better organization of customer information, users, the movements that a person has with his money in the pharmacy, the details of the purchases made of medicines and other products, and ending with multiple reporting options that can make a person to see the information you have in the pharmacy on the actions you have done.

projects.name: Personal Curriculum Vitae
projects.description: In this project I made my personal resume in the form of a web page, hosted with Netlify. I did it to demonstrate my skills using React and JavaScript, I also did it since I find it a very agile and efficient way to do it, since every change I want to make or every element I want to add will be done In real time, so my resume will always be kept updated for recruiters or people who want to see it, it also has a very organized and very informative structure for visitors.

projects.name: Work Calendar
projects.description: Programming a work agenda in the intranet for the employees of the company, facilitating the organization and understanding of the work they have to do every day.
